      • setRestartAfterCrash

        @NonNull
SchedulerConfigurationBuilder setRestartAfterCrash(boolean restartAfterCrash)
        Restarts the last activity immediately after a crash. If an activity is restarted, the AcraScheduler.EXTRA_APP_RESTARTED extra will contain a boolean true. Note that this might interact badly with the crash dialog.
        Parameters:
        restartAfterCrash - if acra should attempt to restart the app after a crash
        Returns:
        this instance
        Since:
        5.2.0
